trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que irá processar a <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize"> </xref> eventos de um <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The ProfileEventHandler delegate is defined for the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> class.
trans-unit.target: O delegado de ProfileEventHandler está definido para o <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>evento da <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>classe.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>

trans-unit.source: You can access the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> class in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application using the `Profile_Personalize` global event, as shown in the example for this topic.
trans-unit.target: Pode aceder a <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>eventos do <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>classe no ficheiro global. asax para a sua aplicação de ASP.NET utilizando o `Profile_Personalize` evento global, como mostrado no exemplo para este tópico.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event to specify a custom user profile.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>eventos para especificar um perfil de utilizador personalizadas.</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Profile%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs> parameter specified for the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event's ProfileEventHandler is set to a non-null value when the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event completes, then the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> will use that value for the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Profile%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Profile%2A>propriedade do <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs>parâmetro especificado para o <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>ProfileEventHandler do evento está definido como um não-nulos valor quando o <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>evento estiver concluída, em seguida, o <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>irá utilizar esse valor da <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Profile%2A>propriedade atual <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Profile%2A> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Profile%2A>
